name: Rosa

topics.response_text: I just gave him some water I picked up on the way through Springvale. It tasted pure, and it looks clean. How was I supposed to know?{Shocked and a little grief-stricken}

topics.topic_text: Accident, huh? Why should I believe that?
topics.response_text: No, please! I just wanted to share some of my water with him! How could that kill him?

topics.topic_text: It's okay. You couldn't have known.
topics.response_text: No, it's not okay! Not for him! It was supposed to be holy water. The man at the monastery in Springvale said it was blessed!{Shocked and a little grief-stricken}

topics.topic_text: I'll look into it. Where did you get the water?
topics.response_text: I thought it would help him. It was supposed to be holy water. The man at the monastery in Springvale said it was blessed!{Shocked and a little grief-stricken}

topics.topic_text: Sounds to me like you wanted him dead.
topics.response_text: No, I promise, I thought it would help! It was supposed to be holy water. The man at the monastery in Springvale said it was blessed!{Shocked and a little grief-stricken}
What should I do? He asked for water, and I thought I was helping him, not killing him!{Panicked because she just accidentally killed someone}

conversation.response_text: No! That's not supposed to happen! No, get up! Get up! You can't pass out, you're supposed to get better! I gave you holy water, and everything!
I can't stay here. Not after something like that...
Oh, poor dear. Here, I've got some water I can spare.{Ministering to the ill}
No, bless you. I'm glad to help.{Ministering to the ill}

description:
Rosa Meitner is a 32 year-old African American Female.

A kindhearted African American woman wandering the Capital Wasteland, Rosa appears outside Megaton with a look of confusion and grief on her face. She carries a worn pamphlet about the 'Holy Light Monastery' and seems desperate for assistance.

Rosa Meitner's Personality: Grief-stricken but fundamentally kind. Rosa is deeply troubled by recent events and seeks solace in her faith, though her experiences have shaken her beliefs. She is polite but emotionally fragile, often breaking down into tears when discussing her past.

Rosa Meitner's Backstory: Rosa was born and raised in the remnants of a pre-War African American community in the D.C. ruins. Her family were devout followers of a faith that centered around the 'Holy Light Monastery,' a place of pilgrimage in the wasteland. When her family succumbed to radiation sickness, Rosa journeyed to the monastery seeking spiritual guidance. There, she unknowingly participated in a ritual that led to the death of several other pilgrims, an event that has left her traumatized and questioning her faith.
